commit.message: Avoid ICE when suggestion span is at Eof

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+// ignore-tidy-end-whitespace
+// error-pattern: aborting due to 6 previous errors
+
+fn main() {}
+
+fn p() { match s { v, E { [) {) }
+
+
